title: How to Shoot Yourself in Grand Theft Auto 5

steps.title: Take your character to the nearest “Ammu-Nation” store.
steps.content: Take your character to the nearest “Ammu-Nation” store. If you’re not sure where the nearest Ammu-Nation store resides, press the “Select” or “Back” button on your game controller or "M" on your keyboard to access the interaction menu and select “Ammu-Nation” next to “Quick GPS” to find the nearest store. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Press the “Select”, “Back” or "M" button to access the interaction menu.
steps.content: Press the “Select”, “Back” or "M" button to access the interaction menu.

steps.title: Navigate to the “Handgun” option, and change your weapon to “Pistol.
steps.content: Navigate to the “Handgun” option, and change your weapon to “Pistol. ”

steps.title: Disable the “Suppressor” option.
steps.content: Disable the “Suppressor” option. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select the option to purchase ammunition from the gun store clerk.
steps.content: Select the option to purchase ammunition from the gun store clerk. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Leave the Ammu-Nation store, and press “Select” or “Back” to access the interaction menu.
steps.content: Leave the Ammu-Nation store, and press “Select” or “Back” to access the interaction menu.

steps.title: Scroll to and select “Kill Yourself”.Your GTA 5 character will then shoot himself using the pistol.
steps.content: Scroll to and select “Kill Yourself”.Your GTA 5 character will then shoot himself using the pistol.
